trait.name: Ink Form
entries: The serpent can meld into the surrounding ink, gaining advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide. It can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Abyssal Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the serpent must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. On a success they become immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Swallow
entries: The serpent can use its action to make one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. On a hit, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the serpent, and it takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) acid damage at the start of each of the serpent’s turns. If the serpent takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the serpent must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the serpent. If the serpent dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The serpent makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its ink tendrils.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Ink Tendrils
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) acid damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the serpent’s next turn. If the target is already {@condition paralyzed}, it is {@condition restrained} instead.

action.name: Ink Wave {@recharge 5}
entries: The serpent releases a wave of ink in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) necrotic damage and becoming {@condition blinded} on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
